00010 #ifndef __PREDEFINED_H__
00011 #define __PREDEFINED_H__
00012 
00013 #define PREDEF_NAME(name)   predef_##name
00014 #define V_PTRTO(name)       ((Value) (((int) &name) + 1))
00015 #ifdef NSRT_BUILD
00016  #define DLLSPEC __declspec(dllexport)
00017 #else
00018  #define DLLSPEC __declspec(dllimport)
00019 #endif
00020 #define DECLARE_POBJ(name)  extern "C" int DLLSPEC PREDEF_NAME(name)
00021 #define POBJ(name)          V_PTRTO(PREDEF_NAME(name))
00022 #define PREDEF_SYM_NAME(name)   sym_##name
00023 #define DECLARE_PSYM(name)  DECLARE_POBJ(PREDEF_SYM_NAME(name))
00024 #define PSYM(name)          POBJ(PREDEF_SYM_NAME(name))
00025 
00026 #endif //__PREDEFINED_H__
